mapper.select: SELECT p.* , case when (SELECT COUNT(*) AS HEARTFILL FROM LIKE_TB WHERE PJ_IDX = P.IDX AND USER_ID = #{SESSIONID}) = 1 THEN 'heart_fill.svg' ELSE 'heart.svg' END AS HEART , COUNT(PAY.ID) AS sumUser , SUM(PAY.AMOUNT) AS sumMoney FROM PROJECT_TB P JOIN PAYMENT_TB PAY ON P.IDX = PAY.pj_IDX WHERE P.IDX = #{IDX};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO LIKE_TB ( IDX , PJ_IDX , USER_ID) VALUES ( (SELECT NUM FROM (SELECT IFNULL(MAX(IDX), 0) + 1 AS NUM FROM LIKE_TB) A) , #{PJ_IDX} , #{USER_ID} )
mapper.delete: DELETE A FROM ALRAM_TB AS A LEFT JOIN PROJECT_TB AS P ON A.pj_IDX = P.IDX WHERE START < CURDATE() AND A.CODE = 'ALM2'
mapper.select: SELECT USER_ID AS ID, TITLE, CODE, START FROM ALRAM_TB A JOIN PROJECT_TB P ON A.PJ_IDX = P.IDX WHERE START = CURDATE()
